title: Long Covid: 'It's like someone has piled sandbags on top of me'
description: A year on since 29-year-old Reece caught coronavirus, what he imagined would be a mild infection changed his life beyond recognition.

title: Covid jab probably does protect those around you
description: Out-of-date information may be deterring people from being vaccinated.

title: Uganda climate change: The people under threat from a melting glacier
description: A glacier in western Uganda is disappearing, endangering the traditions of those who live nearby.

title: Keeping score on UK-EU relations since Brexit
description: Despite promises to work together, it has been far from plain sailing between the UK and the EU since Brexit.

title: Abortion in Italy: 'I found a grave with my name on it'

description: Luke Shaw says he regrets "letting down" England boss Gareth Southgate in the past and wants to "focus on the future" after being recalled.

description: Lockdown easing means open air pools can reopen as the stay-at-home order ends.

description: Steven Johnson was arrested in Alabama last Wednesday and indicted on multiple charges.

description: Poland striker Robert Lewandowski is out of Wednesday's World Cup qualifier against England because of a knee injury.

description: Affectionately known as Granny Sarah by the former president, she defended him during his election campaign.

description: Challenge Cup holders Leeds are drawn against reigning Super League champions St Helens in the third round of this year's competition.

title: The Netflix show putting the spotlight on menopause
